messages.subject: Frankenstein card level up
messages.description: Congrats your Frankenstein card has been level up to level 5 and the Decay effect is activated. if you doesn't login and use your card in 3 days th total EXP will be decayed by 5%, and after that, it will continue decay every 24 hours by 3% of 789 EXP.
